org.ow2.chameleon.rose.api
Class InConnection

java.lang.Object
  org.ow2.chameleon.rose.api.InConnection

public final class InConnection
extends Object

A InConnection allows to import all services matching a given filter with all available ImporterService dynamically. Basically, a proxy is created for each EndpointDescription matching the given filter which are available through the RoseMachine for each ImporterService available. If the EndpointDescription is no more available then its proxy is destroyed.

Author:
barjo
